items.name: Iron Sword
items.description: A sturdy sword made of iron, perfect for beginners.

items.name: Steel Shield
items.description: A reliable shield that offers great protection.

items.name: Healing Potion
items.description: A potion that restores health when consumed.

items.name: Fire Staff
items.description: A staff imbued with the power of fire, capable of casting spells.

items.name: Mystic Robe
items.description: A robe that enhances magical abilities and provides light protection.

items.name: Elven Bow
items.description: A finely crafted bow favored by the elves, known for its accuracy.

items.name: Mana Elixir
items.description: An elixir that restores mana, allowing for more spellcasting.

items.name: Dragon Scale Armor
items.description: Armor made from the scales of a dragon, offering unmatched protection.

items.name: Thunderbolt Amulet
items.description: An amulet that grants the wearer the ability to summon lightning.

items.name: Potion of Strength
items.description: A potion that temporarily increases the drinker's strength.
